Our Story

Our Journey to Excellence

From humble beginnings to industry recognition, see how we've evolved to deliver exceptional results

Limited time offer ends in: 3d 0h
2021

NOX Media Founded

Established with a vision to bridge the gap between web development and digital marketing.

Early clients received exclusive lifetime support packages

Founded by tech and marketing experts, NOX Media started as a boutique agency focused on delivering integrated digital solutions for growing brands.

2021

First Major Client

Secured our first enterprise client and delivered a comprehensive digital transformation.

Achieved 215% ROI for our first major client

Our work with a leading e-commerce brand set the standard for our approach to combining technical excellence with strategic marketing.

2022

Team Expansion

Grew our team of developers, designers, and marketing specialists to meet increasing demand.

Limited partnership opportunities opened

Expanded our capabilities by bringing on board specialized talent in React, Node.js, and influencer relationship management.

2022

Influencer Platform Launch

Developed our proprietary platform for managing influencer campaigns and analytics.

Beta access offered to select clients

Our custom-built platform revolutionized how we track, measure, and optimize influencer marketing campaigns for our clients.

2023

International Expansion

Extended our services to clients across Europe and Asia.

Special rates for international early adopters

Our global reach allowed us to work with diverse brands and influencers, bringing international perspectives to our campaigns.

2023

Industry Recognition

Received multiple awards for our innovative approach to digital marketing.

Limited spots available for award-winning strategies

Our unique methodology combining technical expertise with marketing strategy earned us recognition at several industry events and publications.
